meanings.definition: To ask someone questions to test their knowledge or understanding.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys quizzing her friends on trivia during game night.
meanings.sent2: The teacher is quizzing the students on their math skills.
meanings.sent3: While quizzing her brother, she accidentally asked him a trick question.
meanings.sent4: The detective was quizzing the suspect, trying to uncover the truth.
meanings.sent5: The scientist was quizzing the robot to see if it had learned the new information.

meanings.sent1: He aced the history quiz by studying hard and preparing well.
meanings.sent2: The students were nervous before the surprise quiz in class.
meanings.sent3: The pop quiz caught the students off guard, but they did their best.
meanings.sent4: The quiz at the end of the chapter was challenging but fair.
meanings.sent5: She completed the quiz quickly and confidently, knowing the material well.
